QuestData.Title: Growing the Farm I: A Little Problem
QuestData.Description: So you need to whack some wily weeds?$B$BNo problem, neighbor! Only thing is, I'm running low on weed killer.$B$BI make my own concoction - very potent, totally organic and good for the earth. Plants love it! Well... except for those pesky weeds. They hate the stuff!$B$BIf you bring me some Spideroot from the terraces just west of us, I'll make a fresh batch and go down to Yoon's farm myself.$B$BI would gather some myself but... well... I hate spiders. You'll see what I mean.
